進.definition: to go forward; to advance; to go in; to enter; to put in; to submit; to take in; to admit; (math.) base of a number system; classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

進一步.definition: to go a step further; (develop, understand, improve etc) more; further

進京.definition: to enter the capital; to go to Beijing

進位法.definition: system of writing numbers to a base, such as decimal or binary (math)

進修.definition: to undertake advanced studies; to take a refresher course

進入.definition: to enter; to join; to go into

進出.definition: to enter or exit; to go through

進出口.definition: importation and exportation; import-export; access point; opening that serves as an entrance or exit

進取.definition: to show initiative; to be a go-getter; to push forward with one's agenda

進口.definition: to import; imported; entrance; inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)

進城.definition: to go to town; to enter a big city (to live or work)

進場.definition: to enter the venue; to enter the arena; (aviation) to approach the airfield; (investing) to get into the market

進士.definition: successful candidate in the highest imperial civil service examination; palace graduate

進學.definition: to advance one's learning; to enter the prefecture school under the imperial examination system

進宮.definition: to enter the emperor's palace; (slang) to go to jail

進展.definition: to make headway; to make progress

進攻.definition: to attack; to assault; to go on the offensive; attack; assault; offense (sports)

進料.definition: to feed (a machine); foreign goods (abbr. of 進口資料|进口资料)

進棧.definition: (computing) to push (a value) onto a stack

進步.definition: progress; improvement; to improve; to progress; CL:個|个[ge4]

進水.definition: to have water get in (one's ear, shoes etc); to get flooded; inflow of water

進深.definition: (of a house or room) distance from the entrance to the rear; depth

進發.definition: (of a group of people or a convoy of vehicles) to set off

進站.definition: (of a train, bus etc) to pull into a station; to arrive at a stop; (of a person) to enter a station; to visit a website; to formally begin a temporary postdoctoral research position (China has postdoctoral research "stations" 博士後流動站|博士后流动站[bo2shi4hou4 liu2dong4zhan4] where postdocs conduct research for a limited period.)

進行.definition: (of a process etc) to proceed; to be in progress; to be underway; (of people) to carry out; to conduct (an investigation or discussion etc); (of an army etc) to be on the march; to advance

進行性失語.definition: progressive aphasia; gradual loss of speech

進補.definition: to take a tonic (for one's health)

進襲.definition: raid; to carry out a raid; to invade

進言.definition: to put forward a suggestion (to sb in a senior position); to offer a word of advice

進貢.definition: to offer tribute; to pay tribute that a vassal owes to his suzerain

進貨.definition: to acquire stock; to replenish stock

進賢.definition: Jinxian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi

進賢縣.definition: Jinxian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi

進賬.definition: (of money) to come into an account; to get; to earn; income; receipts

進路.definition: way of proceeding; approach (to a task etc)

進身.definition: to get oneself promoted to a higher rank

進身之階.definition: stepping-stone to greater power or higher rank

進退.definition: to advance or retreat; knowing when to come and when to leave; a sense of propriety

進退不得.definition: can't advance or retreat (idiom); no room for maneuver; stalled; in a dilemma; stuck in a difficult position

進退中繩.definition: to advance or retreat, each has its rules (idiom from Zhuangzi); many translations are possible

進退兩難.definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma; trapped; in an impossible situation

進退失據.definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss; in a hopeless situation

進退有常.definition: to advance or retreat, each has its rules (idiom from Zhuangzi); many translations are possible

進退為難.definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma; trapped; in an impossible situation

進退維谷.definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma; trapped; in an impossible situation

進退自如.definition: free to come and go (idiom); to have room to maneuver

進逼.definition: to advance on sth; to press closely (on some goal)

進道若蜷.definition: progress seems like regress (alternative wording for 進道若退|进道若退[jin4 dao4 ruo4 tui4])

進道若退.definition: progress seems like regress (the Book of Dao 道德經|道德经[Dao4 de2 jing1], Chpt. 41)

進門.definition: to enter a door; to go in; to learn the basics of a subject; to join one's husband's household upon marriage

進香.definition: to burn incense at a temple

進駐.definition: to enter and garrison; (fig.) to establish a presence in
